data.text: Yahweh, I love you, the one who enables me to be strong.
Yahweh is like an overhanging rock [DOU, MET] under which I can hide from my enemies;
I called out to Yahweh, who deserves to be praised,
All around me were dangerous situations in which I might be killed [PRS];
It was as though the place where dead people are had ropes that were wrapped around me,
But when I was very distressed, I called out to Yahweh,
Then the earth quaked/shook strongly [DOU];
It was as though smoke poured out from his nostrils,
He opened the sky and came down
He flew, riding on the back of a creature that had wings,
Darkness was all around him like a blanket [MET];
Hailstones and flashes of lightning were around him;
Then Yahweh spoke in a loud voice from the sky,
He shot his arrows at them and caused them to scatter;
The bottom of the ocean became visible,
It was as though he reached down from heaven and grabbed me
He rescued me from my strong enemies who hated me;
When I ◄was distressed/had troubles►, they attacked me,
He led me to a place where I was safe;
Yahweh has rewarded me because I do what is right;
I have obeyed Yahweh’s laws;
My behavior was directed by his rules;
He knows that I have not done what is wrong;
So he rewards me because I do what is right;
Yahweh, you are faithful to those who faithfully do what you tell them to do;
You are kind to those who are kind to others,
You save those who are humble,
You give light to my soul/spirit;
You enable me to be strong,
Everything that Yahweh my God does is perfect.
Yahweh is [RHQ] the only one who is God;
God is the one who enables me to be strong
He enables me to walk swiftly without stumbling,
He teaches me how to use a strong/metal bow
Yahweh, you protect and save me with your shield;
You have cleared the road for me,
I have pursued my enemies and caught them;
When I strike them, they are not able to get up again;
You have enabled me to be strong
You caused my enemies to run away (OR, you enabled me to put my foot on my enemies’ necks after I captured them and forced them to lie on the ground);
They called out for someone to help them,
I pulverize them,
You enabled me to defeat those who fought against me,
When foreigners hear about me,
They are no longer courageous,
Yahweh is alive!
He enables me to get revenge on my enemies;
and he rescues me from my enemies.
So I praise him and I tell the nations the great things that he has done.
He has enabled me, his king, to powerfully defeat my enemies;
